Member Function Documentation

DiarioController::init (  )  [protected]

Custom initialization for the controller object.

Subclassers should override this method to perform specialized initialization. The default implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented from BaseController.

Reimplemented in BlogController.

DiarioController::live_search (  ) 

Action method that returns a list of articles that satisfy a search query.

Note:
This action does not return a full layout, and is intended to be used with AJAX calls.
